learning_outcomes: Understand the basic concepts of supervised learning

mcqs.question: What is the primary goal of supervised learning?

choices.A: To find patterns in unlabeled data
choices.B: To learn from labeled training data to make predictions

mcqs.learning_outcome: Understand the basic concepts of supervised learning

mcqs.question: Which of the following is a key difference between classification and regression?

choices.A: Classification uses continuous outputs, regression uses discrete outputs
choices.B: Classification predicts discrete labels, regression predicts continuous values
choices.C: Classification requires more data than regression
choices.D: Regression is always more accurate than classification

choices.A: The balance between model complexity and generalization
choices.B: The tradeoff between training time and accuracy
choices.C: The relationship between data size and model performance
choices.D: The choice between different optimization algorithms

mcqs.question: What is the main purpose of cross-validation?

choices.B: To assess model performance on unseen data
choices.C: To reduce the number of features
